para.text: If the Mayor, pursuant to § 2-219.03a, determines that the Company is in compliance with the hiring requirements of §§ 47-4665.01 through 47-4665.05 and the incentive agreement, the Company shall be deemed to be in compliance with the provisions of part A of subchapter X of Chapter 2 of Title 2 of the District of Columbia Official Code.
On or before October 31, the Company shall provide the Mayor with the following information pertaining to the previous tax year:
A detailed report as of the annual reporting date that identifies the:
Number of employees whose primary workplace is located in the District;
Median salary of the District resident employees;
Median tenure of District resident employees; and
A certification of compliance with the Community Benefits Agreement.
The Company shall comply with the requirements contained in § 2-218.46, with regard to the Project.
